works.name: Wargaming (CООО Гейм Стрим)
works.description: Development in WoT Group. We develop UI of World of Tanks, site-portal of the game and another web-services. I responsible for my team, code quality and development processes. Also I help to write difficult systems and take part in the tech and architectural decisions.

works.name: Yzer Lab
works.description: It was internet chat like Telegram. There was translations on any languages by one click on icon near message. Calls appeared there earlier than in Telegram (with video). There was encryption from the beginning. I worked with all of this. We used a functionally reactive program system.

works.name: Покупатель 24
